root.name: Rugrats in Paris
root.description: Overview The park is ready to be exploredRugrats in Paris is a game based on the movie of the same name. It was developed by KnowWonder, and was published by Mattel. The babies travel to Paris on a vacation, and meet new adventures along the way. The entire cast is in the game, Tommy, Chuckie, Phil and Lil, Angelica, and even Reptar the dinosaur. The game consists of games like mini-golf, and of course, exploration. It is available for the Nintendo 64 and the PC, though the PC version is quite different from the Nintendo 64 version.
